content.boldTitle: Bachelor of Science in Computer Science with a Math Minor
content.description: University of Wisconsin-Stout, ABET Accredited Program, GPA 3.58, Menomonie WI

Computer Science 1&2, Data Structures, Cyber Technology Ethics, Advanced Web and Internet Programming, Algorithms, Database Systems, Human Computer Interfaces, Programming in Game Engines, Math Foundations of Computer Graphics, Computer Architecture, Mobile Development in Android, iOS, Software Engineering Principles, Software Engineering Practicum, Systems Programming
Calculus and Analytical Geometry 1&2, Calculus 3, Discrete Mathematics, Linear Algebra, Numerical Analysis 1

Helped develop, maintain, and test a large iOS application written in Swift used for at-home senior care. Practiced Agile development working with a team composed of a wide range of professions. Gained valuable experience improving the large infrastructure of critical corporate software.
C++, TypeScript, JavaScript, C, Kotlin, Java, Swift, HTML/CSS, C#, Rust, Python, PHP
React, Node.js, Android, iOS, AWS, Unity, Express, Linux, NumPy, jQuery, Bootstrap, Git, Docker

content.boldTitle: Applied Math And Computer Science Club
content.lightTitle: September 2017 - February 2020, Served as President from 2019 to 2020.

content.normalTitle: Federal Express Shipping Center, Eau Claire, WI
